## Réimporter les données

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(fs)
library(lubridate)
library(skimr)
```

```{r read}
df_owid <- read_csv(file = "data/raw/2022-12-06_owid-co2-data.csv")

df_gapminder <- read_csv(file = "data/raw/2022-12-06_gapm.csv")
```
